overview: Mike LeBeau is a Senior Software Engineer at Google, where his projects have included: Android Voice, Android Search, iPhone Voice Search, acquisition of GrandCentral and its evolution into Google Voice, Google Maps for Mobile with Voice Search, and 1-800-GOOG-411. Prior to Google, he worked at Tellme Networks, eBay, and PayPal.
